description: A temporary increase in body temperature often due to an illness or infection.
A reflex action to clear your airways of mucus and irritants.
precaution_4: Consult a doctor if lasts more than a week

description: Pain in any region of the head
precaution_1: often caused by stress or dehydration.

description: A viral infection that affects the nose and throat
Pain or irritation in the throat that often worsens when swallowing.
Extreme tiredness resulting from mental or physical exertion or illness.
Feeling of sickness with an inclination to vomit.
Forceful release of stomach contents through the mouth.
Frequent loose or watery bowel movements.
Generalized muscle or joint aches throughout the body.
